# API Reference for cdktf.StringConcat

   StringConcat <a name="StringConcat" id="cdktf.StringConcat"></a>
  
  - *Implements:* <a href="#cdktf.IFragmentConcatenator">IFragmentConcatenator</a>
  
  Converts all fragments to strings and concats those.
  
  Drops 'undefined's.
  
  # Initializers <a name="Initializers" id="cdktf.StringConcat.Initializer"></a>
  
  ```csharp
  using HashiCorp.Cdktf;
  
  new StringConcat();
  ```
  
  | **Name** | **Type** | **Description** |
  | --- | --- | --- |
  
  ---
  
  # Methods <a name="Methods" id="Methods"></a>
  
  | **Name** | **Description** |
  | --- | --- |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.StringConcat.join">Join</a></code> | Concatenates string fragments. |
  
  ---
  
  ## `Join` <a name="Join" id="cdktf.StringConcat.join"></a>
  
  ```csharp
  private object Join(object Left, object Right)
  ```
  
  Concatenates string fragments.
  
  ### `Left`<sup>Required</sup> <a name="Left" id="cdktf.StringConcat.join.parameter.left"></a>
  
  - *Type:* object
  
  ---
  
  ### `Right`<sup>Required</sup> <a name="Right" id="cdktf.StringConcat.join.parameter.right"></a>
  
  - *Type:* object
